snippet.title: OMG! 讓你欲罷不能的魔王級美味料理 Boss-level Dishes Are So Good. They'll Make You Beg for More!
snippet.description:
🏅 2021東京電玩展Tokyo Game Show Indie Selected Exhibit

《大廚老陳》：踏入美食與冒險的結合世界！跟隨老陳參加一場史詩級的奇幻料理比賽。為了餐廳的未來，展現策略與創意，烹調出震撼味蕾的佳餚！單人或組隊，你的料理之旅都將刺激又美味。解鎖關卡、收集夥伴，把廚藝升到巔峰。評審們已經餓了，你準備好大展身手了嗎？

"Chef Chen" is a cooperative cooking and hunting game for 1-4 players. In the game, players participate in a fantasy cooking competition for a high reward as part of Chef Chen's talented cooking team. Due to a funding shortage, Chef Chen must take a risk and compete in the high-stakes competition to quickly earn money for the restaurant's decoration costs. The game takes place in a fantasy world and requires teamwork to overcome challenges and find new partners to enhance creativity and strategy. Each team member must use their skills to serve delicious dishes, impress the judges, and win rewards.

🧡Steam Wishlist & Download https://lihi1.cc/z23lM
🧡itch.io https://buhogame.itch.io/
🧡FB@hellobuho https://lihi1.cc/b8od3

🧡buho.game.tw
